entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being yelled at by Hermione and Ron for yelling loudly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is concerned about his well-being and tries to get him to open up about what happened.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is also concerned about Harry's well-being and helps Hermione try to get him to talk.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who has murdered a woman and her family.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person mentioned by Harry as having been killed by Voldemort in the past.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Harry's well-being and tries to get him to open up about what happened.
Ron is a friend of Harry's, who is also concerned about his well-being and helps Hermione try to get him to talk.
Voldemort has murdered a woman and her family, as mentioned by Harry.
